name: Dungeon Sweeper (germanjazzguy)
description:
Short puzzle game where you have to find your way to the goal without hitting mines or other hazards.

Next to each row/column the number of tiles with a hazard on it is displayed. Bolts are visible, mines are not.

Controls: 

WASD: move

This is a game I made back in 2017 which I rediscovered this morning, so please have mercy on me for poor coding and stuff.
